title: Interenship!!!!!
content: When is the latest, a student can sit in the internship drive(like which sem)? Which all companies visit for hiring interns? how cooperative is the management when it comes to internships(like do they allow students for 3/4/6 months internship)?

comments.body:
Companies start coming in 5th sem (from october) to hire summer interns and then again in 7th sem from july last week for spring internship + full time roles. 

As for 3/4/6 months internships, you are allowed to do it but you can't claim extra credits.

For us it was 3 weeks for 1 credit for a max total of 8 credits. They will mention what dates are included for internship consideration (like you can't claim internship credits in 8th sem if it starts after 8th sem i.e. August onwards or smth)

The management do not care. As long as you get an internship, you need to inform them if you're getting paid or not and the offer letter they gave you. (usually for CSE, they recognize only paid internships I think)

I had a 6 month internship. Yeah they allow that. I know people who worked as an intern for even longer than that. They don't mind at all.
